definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: The first printed books were made by putting ink on a wooden block and holding the paper against it.
sentences.chinese: 第一本印刷書是用紙緊貼塗有墨汁的木版製成的。

sentences.english: Cleaning the wood in relief printmaking will make carving easier.
sentences.chinese: 清潔救濟會雕刻木版畫更容易。

sentences.english: I'd be happy to show you my collection of woodblock prints any time.
sentences.chinese: 我樂意隨時給你看我收集的木版畫。

sentences.english: The author also fully demonstrated Yangjiabu woodblock New Year Pictures'unique features.
sentences.chinese: 充分論證了楊家埠木版年畫獨特的形式特徵。

sentences.english: Even do forty-two days a piece of wood.
sentences.chinese: 連做一塊木版都要四十二天。

sentences.english: Writing in those days was done on wax-coated tablets made of wood.
sentences.chinese: 當時的文字是寫在表面塗蠟的木版上的。

sentences.english: There is a wood board there. It says we can give bread to the monkeys.
sentences.chinese: 那邊有個木版，上面說我們可以餵它們麪包喫。

sentences.english: Forth, elucidating the making process of Yangliuqing Wood NewYear Picture.
sentences.chinese: 論述了楊柳青木版年畫的製作工序。

sentences.english: In its earliest form, printing was done from hand-carved wooden blocks.
sentences.chinese: 最早的印刷方式是用手工雕刻木版印刷。

sentences.english: The Yangjiabu's board pictures are discussed in the area of the region, subject matter and color.
sentences.chinese: 探討楊家埠木版年畫的色彩特徵與設色規律。

sentences.english: Texture can be achieved in relief printmaking by using different types of wood.
sentences.chinese: 紋理可以實現在救災用的木版畫不同類型。

definition: fine writing paper, originally from Jing county 涇縣|泾县, Xuancheng 宣城, Anhui
rough sketch (of a painting)/(of an official) to approve a document by signing it
papercutting (Chinese folk art)/to make paper cutouts
